author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...DEXTER MAINTAINING ITS INTENSITY AS IT MOVES NORTHEASTWARD...
summary: ...DEXTER MAINTAINING ITS INTENSITY AS IT MOVES NORTHEASTWARD... As of 5:00 PM AST Tue Aug 05 the center of Dexter was located near 38.6, -62.2 with movement NE at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1005 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...DEXTER MAINTAINING ITS INTENSITY AS IT MOVES NORTHEASTWARD... As of 5:00 PM AST Tue Aug 05 the center of Dexter was located near 38.6, -62.2 with movement NE at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1005 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Dexter (AT4/AL042025)
